title: State Bank of India removes 'fraud' tag from Religare Finvest
description: The State Bank of India (SBI) has officially removed the 'fraud' tag from Religare Finvest Limited (RFL) as per the Delhi High Court's order. RFL, a subsidiary of Religare Enterprises Limited, had been tagged 'fraud' by SBI in the Reserve Bank of India's database. SBI communicated this decision to RFL on Friday.
